edu.calvin.cs262.prototype.client

Class PathfinderClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.calvin.cs262.prototype.client.PathfinderClient

  • public class PathfinderClient
extends java.lang.Object
    PathfinderClient is a singleton class which handles communication with the server. It provides methods to get building and room model objects. To instantiate PathfinderClient, call the static method PathfinderClient.getInstance() Created by Derek Dik (drd26) on 11/23/2015.
